description:
Kiyo and Zatch have at last returned from the fierce battle in the ruins. They are spending a peaceful New Years Day together with Ponygon when Folgore and Kanchomé visit them. Kiyo shrinks back, and grudgingly invites them in. Folgore tells them of a New
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: New Year Special, The Magnificent V Appears Again!
Shinshun Special: Kareinaru V yo Futatabi!!
新春スペシャル 華麗なるV(ブイ)よ再び!!
